_header: Love is soft love is sweet love is good swear
_description: What Love is like: la manere quele amour est pur assaier — twenty-eight lines generally in monorhyming quatrains, but also couplets, 3 and 5-line monorhyming stanzas

BodDig86.First Lines:
Loue is sofft loue is swet loue is goed swareLoue is muche tene
                    loue is muchel kare…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…Loue comseþ wiþ kare and hendeþ wiþ
                    teneMid lauedi mid wiue mid maide and quene
BodDig86.Attributed Title: Ci comence la manere quele amour est pur assaier (f. 200)
